message.name: B3
message.say: and Cristina. I'm looking forward to this lesson.

message.name: B4
message.say: Great, this always helps me understand what to do during a lesson.

message.name: B6
message.say: Ok great! Let's get started then

message.name: B7
message.say: I thought the answer was, the writer knows a lot about computers.

message.name: B8
message.say: I thought the answer was, I did everything I could to get money. Because If the writer went back to school, he or she could make more money.

message.name: B9
message.say: That's what I thought too. If the writer didn't pay much attention to computers, then he or she probably didn't learn anything about them.

message.name: B10
message.say: Thanks Cristina. I'm on a role!

message.name: B11
message.say: I thought the answer was the writer went to college and did not study.

message.name: B12
message.say: Oh that makes sense, I didn't think about it that way,

message.name: B14
message.say: The writer also said that he or she didn't complete high school, so couldn't the first choice be the right answer too?

message.name: B15
message.say: Okay, so just because the writer says something does not mean it is the main idea?

message.name: B16
message.say: I was not sure about this one. That involved a lot of thinking. This is a tough lesson.
